text: Ol Doinyo Lengai is a volcano in the East African Rift in Tanzania. The name means Mountain of God in the Maasai language. Ol Doinyo Lengai is the only volcano in the world that erupts a rock known as carbonatite. This is a rock which has greater than 50% of carbonate minerals.Bell, Keith (editor) (1989) Carbonatites: Genesis and Evolution, London, Unwin Hyman. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Geography of Tanzania Category:Volcanoes of Africa Category:Carbonate rocks
title: Ol Doinyo Lengai
